item.title: Help of the "attack" when you right click
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Hello,

I have just recently fixed it so that right click only works in the wilderness areas, but the attack wont appear when im in castle wars.

Could somebody show me what i would have to add to this for it to be able to work , ive tried to add it myself but it does not work.

	if(isInWilderness == false) {
		outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
		outStream.writeByteC(3);
		outStream.writeByteA(0);
		outStream.writeString("null");
		outStream.endFrameVarSize();
	}
	if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) {
		outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
		outStream.writeByteC(3);
		outStream.writeByteA(0);
		outStream.writeString("Attack");
		outStream.endFrameVarSize();
	}

Read full topic
item.source: Help of the "attack" when you right click
